QuestData.Title: Our Tribe, Imprisoned
QuestData.Description: Despite their size, the Bristleback greatly outnumber us. A pack ambush can easily overwhelm even the largest tauren.$B$BMany new initiates have taken up arms to defend our home. Some have given their lives, but others have been captured alive.$B$BPlease, find their cages and free them. The battle should keep the quilboar distracted.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks to you, our people are free to fight for our home.
